enhanced_by.reason: Both methods retrieve collections associated with a key, which is crucial for setting up the test environment for removeMapping.
Both methods involve creating or retrieving collections, which can be used to simulate the state before and after the removal operation.
The size method can be used to verify the state of the collection after the removal operation, ensuring the correct number of elements are present.
The containsValue method can be used to verify that the specific value has been removed from the collection associated with the key.
